Package eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Node
  • public final class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a node in the social graph. All contexts share the same instances of the same nodes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Node

        public Node​(java.lang.String id,
            java.lang.Object data)
        Deprecated.
        This constructor will be protected in future versions. Call getOrCreateNode(id, data) of a ContextualEgoNetwork instance instead.
        Constructor method
        Parameters:
        id - identifier of the node
        alias - name of the node that appears on screen
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if id is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the id parameters is empty

    • Method Detail

        public long getOnlineCounter()
        Returns:
        The number of times the node's state has been online

        public void setOnlineStatus​(boolean online)
        Sets the status of the node to online or offline
        Parameters:
        online - Whether the node is online

      • getOnlineStatus

        public boolean getOnlineStatus()
        Returns:
        The status of the node (true if online, false if offline)

      • getScore

        public double getScore()
        Returns:
        A double, which is the score of the node (number of times online divided life span of the node)

      • getId

        public java.lang.String getId()
        Returns:
        The identifier of the node declared in its constructor
